welcome_message: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock!
rock_win: Rock crushes Lizard and crushes Scissors!
paper_win: Paper covers Rock and disproves Spock!
scissors_win: Scissors cuts Paper and decapitates Lizard!
lizard_win: Lizard eats Paper and poisons Spock!
spock_win: Spock smashes Scissors and vaportizes Rock!
overall_winner: Beat the Computer in a best of 5 to be crowned the Grand Winner!
